snippet.title: WAY IndieCade 2011 Award Celebration Trailer
snippet.description:
WAY is a game where two anonymous players communicate through gestures to solve puzzles.

This trailer celebrates WAY's winning of the 2011 IndieCade Developer's Choice Award! Thank you everyone who voted! We love you too!

All footage seen here is entirely from live gameplay.

Download the latest Alpha version at www.MakeOurWAY.com!

Follow @WAYgame on Twitter for news and release updates!

----
Chris Bell, Designer
Cynthia Jiang, Programmer
Hugo Shih, 3D Artist
Katherine Rubenstein, 2D Artist
Paulwei Wang, Producer
Walt Destler, Designer & Programmer
---
Video Acting and Editing by Chris Bell, www.chrisbelldesign.com
Song by Benjamin Price, benjaminjlprice@googlemail.com
